videos.title: Claude Code: Build YouTube Research Agent in 15 Min
videos.creator: Peter Yang
videos.description: Peter Yang demonstrates how to build a YouTube AI research agent using Claude Code. Covers the spec-to-code workflow, creating /youtube slash commands, and batch processing for analyzing multiple YouTube channels.

videos.title: Claude Code Sub-agents & MCP Tutorial
videos.creator: Edmund Yong
videos.description: Deep dive into Claude Code's memory systems, sub-agents for task delegation, and MCP (Model Context Protocol) for connecting external tools and databases.

videos.title: Automate Your Life with Claude Code in 50 Min
videos.creator: Teresa Torres
videos.description: Product coach Teresa Torres reveals her complete Claude Code setup for running her life and business. Features her 3-layer context system, /today command for daily task generation, and Obsidian integration.

videos.title: Claude Code Creator 8-Step Workflow
videos.creator: Boris Cherny
videos.description: Boris Cherny, creator of Claude Code at Anthropic, reveals his exact workflow: 10-15 parallel sessions, Opus 4.5 for everything, /commit-push-pr command, and verification loops for 2-3x quality improvement.

videos.title: Master Claude Code: 3 Technical Founders
videos.creator: Seattle Tech Group
videos.description: Three technical founders from Seattle share their Claude Code mastery techniques including the explore-plan-execute workflow and planner-developer separation patterns.

videos.title: Turn Claude Code into UI Designer using Playwright MCP
videos.creator: Patrick Ellis
videos.description: Patrick Ellis demonstrates how to give Claude Code visual capabilities using Playwright MCP. Covers orchestration layers, iterative agentic loops, and creating custom design reviewer subagents.

videos.title: Skills vs MCP vs Subagents
videos.creator: Solo Swift Crafter
videos.description: Quick decision framework for choosing between Claude Code Skills, MCP servers, and Subagents. Covers when to use each extension mechanism based on use case and complexity.

videos.title: Claude Code Masterclass
videos.creator: CS Dojo
videos.description: Comprehensive beginner-friendly masterclass covering Claude Code fundamentals. Includes essential features, best practices, and practical applications with a Super Voice Assistant demo.

videos.title: Build AI Life Copilot
videos.creator: Alex Finn
videos.description: Alex Finn reveals his 'Claude Life' operating system for automating research, news curation, and brain dump analysis. Shows how to set up /researcher, /daily_brief, and /brain_dump commands.

videos.title: Inside Claude Code
videos.creator: Cat Wu
videos.description: Cat Wu, founding product manager of Claude Code at Anthropic, reveals how the most AI-native team works: design-to-code workflows, rapid prototyping instead of docs, and designers shipping production code.

ingestion_commands.batch_process: For each video in this JSON, extract transcript first, then run ingest

notes: Videos marked NEEDS_URL_VERIFICATION require manual YouTube search
SEARCH_BEHIND_THE_CRAFT videos are on Peter Yang's YouTube channel
All transcripts go to Supabase knowledge_base table
Reference cards should be created after transcript ingestion
